name: Weaponizing Truth Against PSN Control
description: Using strategic truth deployment to disrupt manipulative narratives and expose PSN deception.

cards.title: Precision Truth Bombing
cards.description: Releasing undeniable truths at key moments to undermine PSN control.
bulletpoints: Identifying psychological choke points where truth inflicts maximum damage.
Using evidence stacking to build irrefutable counter-narratives.
Timing truth drops for maximum psychological impact.
cards.summaryText: Stack receipts and detonate them at the pressure point where their narrative shatters.

cards.title: The Mirror Effect
cards.description: Forcing PSNs to confront their own contradictions and lies.
bulletpoints: Using their own words and actions against them to reveal hypocrisy.
Creating scenarios that expose their manipulative tactics in real time.
Weaponizing public perception to dismantle their credibility.
cards.summaryText: Hold up their words and deeds until the crowd sees the hypocrisy explode.

cards.title: Narrative Redirection Warfare
cards.description: Redirecting false PSN narratives toward self-destruction.
bulletpoints: Exploiting weaknesses in their messaging to fracture their influence.
Introducing counter-narratives that force cognitive dissonance.
Leading their followers to question their legitimacy through Socratic dialogue.
cards.summaryText: Twist their storyline inward until followers question every scripted line.
